product_name: Scarpa Manhattan Canvas Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The street savvy Scarpa Manhattan Canvas Shoes have the same sophisticated style of the leather Manhattan shoes, only cooler-in a literal sense. Breathable hemp/polyester mesh combines with suede for an attractive look and better warm-weather comfort than a full leather shoe. Recycled-polyester linings help move moisture. Vibram(R) Bjorn outsoles provide good grip on urban landscapes. Closeout.
short_description: The street savvy Scarpa Manhattan Canvas Shoes have the same sophisticated style of the leather Manhattan shoes, only cooler-in a literal sense.
